name: Quake III: Team Arena
description:
Quake III: Team Arena is an action game. It came out on 18-12-2000. Most rawgers rated the game as "Meh".
You can play Quake III: Team Arena on PC.
It was produced by Jonathan Knight and Marty Stratton. Graeme Devine, Jonathan Knight and Marty Stratton directed the game. It was scored by Christian Antkow and Sascha Dikiciyan.
